subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Peyton Siva scored 15 points, the freshman Gorgui Dieng had 13 points and No. 16 Louisville beat No. 13 Connecticut, 71-58, at home.
snippet: Peyton Siva scored 15 points, the freshman Gorgui Dieng had 13 points and No. 16 Louisville beat No. 13 Connecticut, 71-58, at home.
